main event: An observer reported seeing a bright red glowing object moving across the sky with a grayish vapor trail on December 28, 1955.
interesting points: The object was observed moving at high speed and disappeared after 10-15 seconds,The observer described the object as round or oval in shape,The object appeared to be the size of a full moon,There were clear weather conditions at the time of the sighting,The observer was driving north on Highway 85-87 when they spotted the object.
sighted object: a bright red glowing object with a grayish vapor trail
witness description: The witness was driving alone and reported the sighting to NORAD.
